attributes.action: Stop the new bike test in october!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the priminister should step in and stop the new test for motorcyclist in october. Im not against the off road test just its not ready. Im going to have to travel 40miles to do my test and i know many other people who are in the same boat. This in turn would exhaust riders by the time they would go and do there test also they will be driving round unfamilure roads. The increase in price also is a off putting factor.
